articles.author: Varg Folkman
articles.title: Nuclear weapons on the table if Ukraine counteroffensive succeeds: Russia's Medvedev - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: There would be ‘no other way out’ if Kyiv takes Russian territory, says the former Russian president and current National Security Council deputy chairman.
articles.content: If Ukraine’s ongoing counteroffensive against Moscow’s invasion captures Russian territory, there would be no alternative to using strategic nuclear weapons, Russia’s Dmitry Medvedev warned on Sunday… [+1273 chars]

articles.title: Europe Worried About Gross Undie Situation For Moon Astronauts - Futurism
articles.description: The European Space Agency appears to be preoccupied with what goes on in astronauts' underwear — and is doing research on it, too.
articles.content:
Don't read this while eating.
Astronaughty Bits
The European Space Agency appears to be preoccupied with what goes on in astronauts' nethers and they've commissioned a study dedicated to fighting m… [+2542 chars]

articles.title: No cease-fire while Ukraine is on the offensive, Putin declares - POLITICO Europe

articles.author: WION Video Team
articles.title: How to keep the underwear clean on the Moon? ESA has the answer! - WION
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) is developing antimicrobial solutions for space missions. The solutions will be assessed by PExTEx project. ESA will use secondary metabolites produced by microbes & convert their antibiotic properties into textiles.
